short_description: 【4-STAGE "GROW-WITH-ME" SYSTEM】 Designed for 0-24 months. The smart adaptable mesh sling evolves with your baby. Stage 1 (0-3m): Roll up the straps to create a high-floating hammock for newborns. Stage 2 (3-6m): Unroll specifically for a reclined position that cradles active infants. Stage 3 (6-9m): Insert the support bar to create a secure assisted sitting rest that helps babies learn to sit up. Stage 4 (9-24m+): Remove the sling entirely for a spacious toddler splash tub.

【INTELLIGENT TEMPERATURE MONITOR】 Stop guessing if the water is too hot or cold. Unlike traditional tubs, our lion-themed bath features a built-in digital thermometer that displays real-time water temperature. This ensures your baby’s sensitive skin is always protected, giving new parents total peace of mind during bath time.

【SPACE-SAVING COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN】 Ideal for modern homes and travel. While standard tubs are bulky, our innovative design folds flat easily (as thin as a few inches). It features a convenient hanging hook hole, allowing you to store it behind a door or on a wall to save precious bathroom space. Perfect for apartments or grandma’s house.

【SECURE & COMFORTABLE SUPPORT】 Safety is our priority. The bathtub features non-slip sturdy legs for stability on wet surfaces. The skin-friendly mesh sling is soft, breathable, and quick-drying, preventing water accumulation. The unique "Lion" shape isn't just cute; the rounded edges ensure there are no sharp corners to hurt the baby.

【HASSLE-FREE DRAINAGE & USE】 Make cleanup a breeze. This all-in-one bathing solution makes a thoughtful and practical baby shower gift for expecting moms.
